Inicio.text: I offer my programming and development services for all kinds of projects.

Inicio.phrase: ''We are no longer in the Information Age; we are in the era of Information Management.'' Chris Hardwich
phrases_ds: ''We are no longer in the age of information. We are in the era of information management.'' Chris Hardwich
''It's easy to lie with statistics. It's hard to tell the truth without statistics'' Andrejs Dunkels
''In God we trust. All others must bring data.'' William Edwards Deming
''The role of data analytics in an organization is to provide a greater level of specificity to discussion.'' Jeff Zeanah
''Data is the language of the powerholders.'' Jodi Petersen
''Data Science isn't about the quantity of data but rather its quality.'' Joo Ann Lee
''Data is the nutrition of artificial intelligence. When an AI eats junk food, it's not going to perform very well.'' Matthew Emerick
''All analytics models do well at what they are biased to look for.'' Matthew Schneider
''Data and data science greatly influence everything we doâ€¦The impact that data has and will haveâ€¦continues to grow every day.'' Ronald van Loon
''Information is the oil of the 21st century, and analytics is the combustion engine.'' Peter Sondergaard
''Most of the world will make decisions by either guessing or using their gut. They will be either lucky or wrong'' Suhail Doshi
''That which cannot be measured cannot be proven'' Anthony W. Richardson
''Aim for simplicity in Data Science. Real creativity wonâ€™t make things more complex. Instead, it will simplify them.'' Damian Duffy Mingle
''Data scientist (n.): Person who is better at statistics than any software engineer and better at software engineering than any statistician.'' Josh Wills
''If we have data, letâ€™s look at data. If all we have are opinions, letâ€™s go with mine.'' Jim L. Barksdale
phrases_daw: ''Don't worry if it doesn't work right. If everything did, you'd be out of a job.'' Mosher's Law of Software Engineering
''There are only two kinds of programming languages: those people always complain about and those nobody uses.'' Bjarne Stroustrup
''PHP is a minor evil perpetrated and created by incompetent amateurs, whereas Perl is a great and insidious evil perpetrated by skilled but perverted professionals.'' Jon Ribbens
''The use of COBOL cripples the mind; its teaching should therefore be regarded as a criminal offense.'' E. W. Dijkstra
''First, solve the problem. Then, write the code. Don't fall in love with your code.'' George Carrette
''Iterating is human, 'recursing' is divine'' L. Peter Deutsch
''The best thing about boolean is that even if you are wrong, you are only off by a bit.'' Anonymous
''Should array indices start at 0 or 1? My compromise of 0.5 was rejected without, I thought, proper consideration.''
''Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.'' Martin Golding
''I have always wished for my computer to be as easy to use as my telephone; my wish has come true because I can no longer figure out how to use my telephone.'' Bjarne Stroustrup
''The object-oriented version of 'Spaghetti code' is, of course, 'Lasagna code'. (Too many layers).'' Roberto Waltman
''When someone says: 'I want a programming language in which I need only say what I wish done', give him a lollipop.'' Alan J. Perlis
''Good design adds value faster than it adds cost.'' Thomas C. Gale
''Talk is cheap. Show me the code.'' Linus Torvalds
''In theory, theory and practice are the same. In practice, they are not.'' Yogi Berra
''I invented the term 'Object-Oriented', and I can tell you I did not have C++ in mind.'' Alan Kay

Servicios.title: Services
Servicios.text1: I am a passionate data scientist and FullStack web developer with a unique ability to merge creativity with functionality. My goal is to create engaging digital experiences that are not only visually appealing, but also intuitive, effective and data-driven. My focus is on developing innovative solutions that combine robust data analytics with exceptional web design.
Servicios.text2: Every project I tackle begins with extensive research on the target audience and analysis of relevant data. I believe in user-centered design, ensuring that every visual element and interaction is designed to provide an experience that meets the needs and expectations of users, supported by detailed data and predictive analytics.
Servicios.text3: My approach in web development is based on obtaining tangible results, both in terms of user experience and data generated. I use cutting-edge technologies to build websites that not only look good but also work seamlessly on different devices and browsers. Additionally, I optimize these sites through data analysis to improve their performance and effectiveness, ensuring scalable, data-driven solutions.
Servicios.text4: I believe in open and fluid communication with my clients, understanding their goals and needs, and working together to turn their vision into a stunning digital reality, backed by data analysis. Collaboration is key to achieving exceptional results in both web development and data science, and I strive to maintain a transparent and proactive working relationship.
Servicios.text5: The fields of design, web development, and data science are constantly evolving, and I am committed to staying up to date with the latest trends and technologies. This allows me to offer fresh and innovative solutions that keep my clients at the forefront of online and data analytics. My commitment to innovation ensures that every project I undertake lives up to the highest industry standards.
Servicios.text6: My skill set includes experience in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, as well as frameworks such as Tailwind CSS and React for web development. In the field of data science, I have experience in Python, R and machine learning tools for data analysis. Additionally, I have experience optimizing websites for performance and accessibility, backed by data analysis, ensuring each project is fast, accessible, and based on valuable and accurate information.
